meanings.definition: The act or process of forming a mental image or concept of something
meanings.sent1: Creating visualizations helps us imagine things in our minds.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use visualizations to understand complex ideas better.
meanings.sent3: I tried to make a visualization of my dream house, but it ended up looking like a spaceship.
meanings.sent4: Her description of the sunset was a beautiful visualization of nature's artistry.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting was a stunning visualization of her emotions.

meanings.definition: A technique for creating images, diagrams, or animations to represent data or information
meanings.sent1: Visualizations are used in presentations to make data easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: The infographic included colorful visualizations to illustrate the statistics.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's visualization of the problem made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The visualizations in the report made the information more engaging.
meanings.sent5: The virtual reality game had incredible visualizations of futuristic worlds.

meanings.definition: The practice of using mental imagery to achieve a specific goal
meanings.sent1: Athletes often use visualizations to improve their performance in sports.
meanings.sent2: The therapist guided her through a relaxation visualization exercise.
meanings.sent3: During the exam, I did a quick visualization of acing all the questions.
meanings.sent4: His visualization of success motivated him to work harder towards his goal.
meanings.sent5: The meditation app offers guided visualizations for stress relief.
